subject: Address
description_text:
Hello, i am writing about my Order #SSN366 as i have made a mistake. My
address is wrong and i would like to inform you it is gulbės g.13A not
gulbės g.13

conversations.body_text: Hi Domas Zilinskas,     Don't worry, I've already made the changes for you. Please confirm.    Domas Žilinskas  Gulbės g. 13A  LT53212 Jonučiai  Lithuania  +370 674 39129

Hi, thank you for changing it.

On Friday, November 21, 2025, service@simsonn.com
